Articles.Content:
Maybe someone can point my nose:

The problem: Rover; for transport it should be as slim and driving around on low-g-bodies as wide as possible ... well reasonably. Is there a mod that offers the possiblity to fold wheels and attachments away ?

Thanks !

K

Edited September 16, 2014 by kemde
Misspelling
Infernal Robotics and Tweakscale do a pretty good job. Also this would maybe go in the modding forum? I dunno I'm a newbie

That's it, thanks !

And sorry for posting wrong ...

Is there a mod that offers the possiblity to fold wheels and attachments away ?

K

Both the packrat from the USI exploration pack, and the PRC can be dismantled and the parts stored in containers...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86695

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86343-New-project-from-ASET
